/**
 * Link Component - Navigation links.
 *
 * @example
 * ```tsx
 * import { Link } from '@orion-ds/react';
 *
 * <Link href="/about">About Us</Link>
 * <Link href="/docs" variant="subtle">Documentation</Link>
 * <Link href="/pricing" variant="brand">View Pricing</Link>
 * <Link href="https://example.com" external>External Link</Link>
 * ```
 */
export { Link } from './Link';
export type { LinkProps, LinkVariant, LinkSize } from './Link.types';

props.name: external
props.description: Whether the link opens in a new tab

props.name: showExternalIcon
props.description: Whether to show the external link icon automatically when external is true

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon to display before the link text

props.name: iconRight
props.description: Icon to display after the link text (e.g., external link icon)
